text:
Hi, Susan. 
Thank you. 
Martin’s (Tweet?) in the attached pic noted that the Github script was to
‘handle the Recovery Partition being in FRONT’ 
His Github article indicates: 
“ This can only be done in an automated fashion, if the disk: 
- is formatted as recommended for UEFI (with the recovery partition being at the
very end of the disk)

metadata.subject: RE: [patchmanagement] Create/Recreate recovery partition
metadata.email_text_original:
Hi, Susan. 
Thank you. 
Martin’s (Tweet?) in the attached pic noted that the Github script was to
‘handle the Recovery Partition being in FRONT’ 
His Github article indicates: 
“ This can only be done in an automated fashion, if the disk: 
- is formatted as recommended for UEFI (with the recovery partition being at the
very end of the disk) 
From: 'Susan Bradley' via PatchManagement <patchmanagement@googlegroups.com>
Sent: January 22, 2024 5:59 PM
To: patchmanagement@googlegroups.com
Subject: Re: [patchmanagement] Create/Recreate recovery partition 
https://github.com/MHimken/WinRE-Customization
